Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides containing unnatural amino acid exhibit potent bactericidal activity against ESKAPE pathogens.
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Abercrombie JJ, Wong RK, Leung KP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MBC=50µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii WRAIR13(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii WRAIR13(MBC=50µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae BAMC 07-18(MIC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae BAMC 07-18(MBC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>100µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MIC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MBC=>100µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MMC4(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MMC4(MBC=25µg/ml)
